snippet: As one member of the team that operates the remote rover Curiosity at NASA’s Jet Propulsion Laboratory put it, “Last night I drove on Mars, today I mowed the lawn — it’s completely surreal.”
abstract: Team of 16 NASA scientists charged with 'driving' the Mars rover Curiosity captured the imagination of the world when video showing their reaction to the rover's landing was distributed widely on the Internet; they describe their lives as normal, concerned with the mundane things that other people are concerned with, and yet their day jobs consist of operating a machine on a distant planet.
lead_paragraph: As one member of the team that operates the remote rover Curiosity at NASA’s Jet Propulsion Laboratory put it, “Last night I drove on Mars, today I mowed the lawn — it’s completely surreal.”

headline.main: Mow Yard. Drop Off Kids. Take a Drive on Mars.
headline.print_headline: Mow Yard. Drop Off Kids. Take a Drive on Mars.
